SEARCH
Package com.fane.Back_End.packageV2

Interface Recordable

All Superinterfaces:
Command, Originator
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangeSelectionCommand, CopyCommand, CutCommand, DeleteCommand, InsertCommand, PasteCommand
public interface Recordable extends Command, Originator
The Recordable interface represents an entity that can be recorded, undoable, and redoable. It extends both the Command and Originator interfaces, inheriting their functionalities. The Recordable interface combines the ability to execute a command (as specified by Command) with the ability to capture and restore its internal state (as specified by Originator). This is typically used in the context of the command pattern to support undo and redo operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mohamed AL AFTAN Djakaridja FANE
